content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Aziz, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I think we can come to an agreement on the rental price. Can you please make an offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to negotiate on the rental price. Can you please tell me the current price of the apartment?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Certainly, the current rental price for the apartment is 700 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to negotiate on the rental price. Can you please tell me the minimum price you are willing to accept?

Also, I want to know if the apartment is furnished or not?

Thanks for your time, I appreciate it.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Of course, I am willing to negotiate on the rental price. My minimum price for the apartment is 650 Euros per month. As for the furnishings, the apartment is partially furnished, but you can always add or remove furniture as per your requirements.
name: Heinrich Heine
